title: A Poet's Quest for the Eternal Flower
description: A Poet's Quest for the Eternal Flower is a modern day epic journey which shall enrapture your senses and enliven your being. It is an eclectic marriage of poignant poetry, inspired tale, and conceptual illustrations. Stride with Sir Lyric through a bristling landscape strewn with poetry around every bend. This timeless tale is not only for poetry aficionados but for everyone who enjoys epic adventure, substance, and beauty.
author: Reynaldo Casison
